main event: A light with two dim red lights was observed for five seconds in Dayton, Ohio on April 13, 1960.
interesting points: The observation lasted only five seconds., The Municipal Airport reported a similar sighting at the same time., The object disappeared shortly after being spotted., The witness was familiar with experiments and evaluations., The object was assumed to be a meteor according to the report.
sighted object: a light with two dim red lights
witness description: The witness was cooperative and interested, familiar with experiments and evaluations.
